content: **please note ** as my dayjob doesn t leave me enough time to come up with something new i chose to close my business & put everything i designed so far online for free have fun with it but there will be no email support when you have problems/questions as i won t be around anymore bye julia ------------------- how about adding some beads to your knitting create a stunning and elegant pair of gloves just by sprinkling in some shiny beads and a few cables this pattern features a detailed tutorial how to include small beads into your knitting without prestringing or using a crochet hook **size // hand circumference** s // 18 cm 7 m // 19 cm 7 5 l // 20 5 cm 8 **materials ** 383 meters 419 yards of fingering weight yarn about 100g 3 5 oz 166 172 182 japanese seed beads 3 mm 8/0 sewing needle and thread these gloves are knit using the magic loop method however you can use double pointed needles or two circular needles if you prefer
